title: gaanaamudha paanam
sahitya:
gAnAmuda pAnam kanda irukka vEru pAnamIdu abhimAnam unakkEn manamE



anupallavi



jnAna muda guhan aruLAl akhila mELa rAga ratnAkarattirk-kaDaindu eDutta
kanda



caraNam



sholla mudODu nal upakaraNangaLAm shruti layamODu navarasam uravE
kani tulya kavi kunjaradAsan tudi sheyyum jyOtisvarUpiNi shakti vEl aruLAl
amaiyum
